RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.ColumnClassName: MldHostResults MldHostResults MldHostResults MldHostResults MldHostResults MldHostResults MldHostResults
RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.ColumnPropertyName: McastCompatibilityMode HostState TxFrameCount RxFrameCount RxUnknownTypeCount RxMldCheckSumErrorCount RxMldLengthErrorCount
RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.SqlString: SELECT Port.Name AS 'Port Name', AllDevice.Name AS 'Device Name', MldHostResults.McastCompatibilityMode AS 'Multicast Version', MldHostResults.HostState AS 'Host State', SUM(MldHostResults.TxFrameCount) AS 'Tx Frames', SUM(MldHostResults.RxFrameCount) AS 'Rx Frames', SUM(MldHostResults.RxUnknownTypeCount) AS 'Rx Unknown Types', SUM(MldHostResults.RxMldCheckSumErrorCount) AS 'Rx MLD Checksum Errors', SUM(MldHostResults.RxMldLengthErrorCount) AS 'Rx MLD Length Errors' FROM AllDevice, Port, MldHostResults, MldHostConfig, RelationTable WHERE ( RelationTable.Type = 'AffiliationPort' AND RelationTable.SourceHnd = AllDevice.Handle AND RelationTable.TargetHnd = Port.Handle AND MldHostConfig.ParentHnd = AllDevice.Handle AND MldHostResults.ParentHnd = MldHostConfig.Handle AND MldHostResults.IfHandle = MldHostConfig.IfHandle AND AllDevice.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Port.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND MldHostResults.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND MldHostConfig.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND RelationTable.DataSetId = @DataSetId ) GROUP BY MldHostResults.IfHandle
RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.Name: RealTimeResultGroupDefinition 20

ResultQuery.PropertyIdArray: mlddeviceresults.mcastcompatibilitymode multicastdeviceresults.txframecount multicastdeviceresults.rxframecount multicastdeviceresults.rxunknowntypecount mlddeviceresults.rxmldchecksumerrorcount mlddeviceresults.rxmldlengtherrorcount mlddeviceresults.hoststate
ResultQuery.Name: ResultQuery 9
